subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Columbus Blue Jackets placed defenseman Ole-Kristian Tollefsen on injured reserve. Tollefsen is expected to be sidelined for four to six weeks with a lower body injury, General Manager Scott Howson said. He has 1 assist and 37 penalty minutes in 19 games this season.
